underlying_goal: To refactor and clean up shell aliases in the dotfiles repository by standardizing environment variable usage and removing legacy cruft.
friction_detail: The CodeRabbit tool was not installed, so Claude had to switch to a manual review process.
primary_success: Identified and proposed a comprehensive refactoring plan for environment variables in aliases, which also fixed a latent bug in `aliases_speechmatics.sh`.
brief_summary: The user asked for a review of alias environment variable usage. Claude first attempted to use CodeRabbit but it was not installed, then performed a thorough manual review. Claude proposed a detailed plan to standardize directory variables, remove broken aliases, and in the process, discovered and fixed an existing bug.
